r.s: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP
r.d: PHP_Compat provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP.
r.n: Added more components: * DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR * pg_affected_rows * pg_unescape_bytea * pg_escape_bytea * ibase_timefmt * get_headers * debug_print_backtrace * mhash Bug fixes: * Improved loadVersion method * Fixed bug in clone
